title: Casual script font with pretty h and l loops
content:
Hi. You all have come through for me before. I work for author Susan Mallery, and HOLD ME is the title of one of her books that will be out next year. I'd like to use the same font for her advertising materials, but it's quicker to get an answer from you than to try to contact her publisher's art department. :) Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hold-me_5387.jpg)
author: Jenel

comments.content:
Appears to be CAC Champagne (free for personal use):  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/CAC-Champagne.font?text=hold%20me](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075501/http:/www.whatfontis.com/CAC-Champagne.font?text=hold%20me "http://www.whatfontis.com/CAC-Champagne.font?text=hold%20me")
Thank you! That does look like what it is. I'll need to buy it since I won't be using it for personal use. Thank you!

Actually, it looks like it’s free for commercial use too: [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/CAC-Champagne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075501/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/CAC-Champagne "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/CAC-Champagne")
